items.text: arm ball at a length in the corridor, under-edge into the covers as he cuts
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: another quicker one in the corridor and again, he's caught halfway into the backward movement as he cuts. Straight to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, can't get his drive towards long-on past the midwicket fielder
items.postText: That is dot ball number 71 out of 102 deliveries bowled in this innings. It gives Mehidy his first maiden.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length outside off, chopped to point on the bounce
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short ball outside off, can't get the cut past the square. It's off the under-edge
items.postText: supun: "so, what will first reach to 100....no.of dot balls or Afghanisthan's total...?"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: inside edge past off stump. Can't get the cut away this time. This short of a length ball skids low into the corridor. It flies through to Rahim on the bounce
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, nudged to midwicket off the front foot
items.postText: And with that, the required rate has touched run-a-ball.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, steps out and drives to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped into the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, on the back foot to punch to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length ball skidding in towards the stumps. Tapped to extra cover's right and they pinch a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off stump, drives towards long-off but the bowler dives to his left to stop this
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length outside off, sliced to extra cover's left
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: bang. Mortaza looking to get his overs out of the way while Afghanistan are in a rut. So Shahzad is going to target him. Steps out and slaps a length ball flat over his head
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length on off stump, opens the face and drops it into the point region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: swatted away. Length ball on off stump, steps out again, half-crouches as he shifts the weight into the leg side and gets this flat-batted between extra cover and mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, slices straight to point
items.postText: Nayeem: "Is Shakib carrying any kind of injury or Mash keeping his main weapon in his sleeves for the later part of the match?" --- I think Mortaza identifies that he's going to be the one they'll come after and he's trying to get his overs out of the way
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on off, drops into the off side with an open face
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, whipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, can't get his drive past the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full on off stump, turns it into a full toss and slices to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short on middle stump, backs away and cuts past cover point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 2 runs

items.text: shot. That's fifty for Shahzad. This is caressed, not crashed. Full on off stump, plays very late and opens the wrists to find the gap in the covers. No one in the deep on the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs
